Method Detail

keyReplace

public static void keyReplace(java.lang.String filename,
                              java.lang.String key,
                              java.lang.String newValue)
                       throws JEdPointException
Replaces a key in a java.util.Properties file with a new key. It keeps everything else in the file exactly the same, only the key is replaced. If the key does not exist and create == true, the key is added to the bottom of the file, else nothing.

JEdPointException

checkDirectory

public static void checkDirectory(java.lang.String dirToCheck)
                           throws JEdPointException
Checks to see if a directory exists.

If the directory doesn't exist it will try to create one. If a file exists that has the directory name, it will throw an exception (and terminate).

JEdPointException

replaceString

public static java.lang.String replaceString(java.lang.String stringToUse,
                                             java.lang.String stringToFind,
                                             java.lang.String stringReplaceWith)
Replaces a string in a string with another string.

Just a quick string replacement method so that you don't have to sit and roll your own.
Replaces all occurrences of stringToFind with stringReplaceWith.

removeLine

public static java.lang.String removeLine(java.lang.String complete,
                                          java.lang.String lineToRemove)
Removes a whole line from a text.

Parameters:
complete - The Whole Text.
lineToRemove - The line to be removed has this keyword.
Returns:
complete without the line if lineToRemove was found, else complete.

unicodeConvert

public static java.lang.String unicodeConvert(java.lang.String codepage,
                                              java.lang.String stringToConvert,
                                              boolean toUnicode)
Converts a string from the specified codepage to / from unicode.

Currently, the following codepages are accepted: CP*** LATIN-1 IBMPC PC-8

Parameters:
codepage - The codepage the string is encoded in
stringToConvert - String to be converted
toUnicode - Convert TO unicode? (false = FROM)
Returns:
A Unicode encoded string

GregorianCalendarToString

Parameters:
gc - A gregorian calendar.

compressByteArray

public static byte[] compressByteArray(byte[] ArrayToUse,
                                       boolean compress,
                                       int compressionLevel)
Compresses/Decompresses an array of bytes.

There are several compression levels. They vary from 9 = max compression to 0 = no compression.
If compress == false (set to uncompress) then compressionLevel can be set to anything.

saveObject

public static boolean saveObject(java.lang.String Filename,
                                 java.lang.Object ObjectToSave)
Saves a whole object to disk.

Use this method to save a complete object (class, String, Vector, whatever) to a specified location on disk. You can then use loadObject to load it.

loadObject

Loads a specific object from disk.

Returns:
null if it fails
